short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a reaction game, you have to press the right key as fast as you can! by CCIB

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reaction game for keyboard typing, when starting the game, there are three attempts, you have to wait for the key to appear and click the corresponding key as soon as possible, the final time will be the avarge of the three attempt.
*Hold Delete to reset best time
